TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeDomComponentSerializationService extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService
Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomComponentSerializationService Inherits ComponentSerializationService

summary.span: 序列化的序列化存放區中的一組元件。

span.span: Serializes a set of components into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會序列化的序列化存放區中的一組元件或可序列化的物件。The class serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 存放區然後可以在稍後還原序列化。The store can then be deserialized at a later time. 類別不同於其他序列化配置，序列化格式是不透明，並可讓部分序列化的物件。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，您可以選擇只選取的屬性的物件進行序列化。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 基底類別中， ，會取代介面從.NET Framework 1.0 版中，雖然後者會保留回溯相容性。The base class, , replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility. 類別未實作介面，但如果您查詢，則提供橋接的實作，以確保回溯相容性。The class does not implement the interface, but if you query for , the provides a bridge implementation to ensure backward compatibility.

summary.span: 還原序列化給定至指定的容器，並選擇性地套用預設屬性值。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container, optionally applying default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將還原序列化指定的存放區，但而不是產生新的物件，存放區中的資料套用至一組現有的物件，會從`container`參數。The method deserializes the given store, but rather than producing new objects, the data in the store is applied to an existing set of objects that are taken from the `container` parameter. 如此一來，呼叫端可以事先建立物件但其認為適合。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果物件已還原序列化的狀態，而物件的名稱不在一組現有的物件，就會建立新的物件。If an object has deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果該物件也會實作，它會加入至指定的容器。If that object also implements , it will be added to the given container. 在容器中的物件必須有名稱和比對的序列化存放區中要使用的現有物件的順序物件的型別。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

exception.span: 或 為 。

summary.span: 在指定的物件上將指定的成員序列化。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以針對相同的物件，以建立一份已序列化的序列化存放區中的成員叫用多次。This method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 此成員通常會有屬性或事件。The member generally has to be a property or an event.

The given member.

summary.span: 將指定物件上的指定成員序列化，但若其包含預設屬性值，就也會將該成員序列化。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, but also serializes the member if it contains the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些成員，包含預設屬性值，並將相同的值設定回成員是不同的概念。For some members, containing the default property value and setting the same value back to the member are different concepts. 比方說，如果屬性繼承它的值從父物件，如果未不設定任何本機的值，設定至屬性的值可能無法預期。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object if no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法會將此納入帳戶，並會在此情況下清除屬性的狀態。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.
